Script text is being edited by server

This error occurs when you try to run a VI while you are still editing a script in the server. When you right-click the border of a script node and select Edit In Server from the shortcut menu, LabVIEW opens a server window where you can edit the script in the server environment. You cannot run the VI until you finish editing the script.

To correct this error, finish editing the script and close the server window before you run the VI.
